**"The Counterfeit Detective" by Adam Mitzner**

In this gripping thriller, Sam (short for Samuel) is a brilliant and resourceful detective who specializes in counterfeiting cases. When a mysterious counterfeiter starts producing perfect fake US currency, Sam is tasked with tracking down the culprit and stopping the operation.

As Sam delves deeper into the case, he finds himself in a complex web of deceit, corruption, and high-stakes heists. He must use his exceptional skills and knowledge of the dark world of counterfeiting to unravel the mystery and bring the perpetrators to justice.

Throughout the book, Sam's character is expertly woven into the narrative, showcasing his intelligence, determination, and wit. You'll be on the edge of your seat as he navigates the treacherous world of counterfeiting, facing off against cunning criminals and corrupt officials along the way.

2. **"Sam Sheppard: The Missing Chapter" by James A. Sergent**: Another true crime book, this one explores the unsolved murder of Dr. Sheppard's wife and the subsequent trial that captivated the nation.

I hope you enjoy "The Counterfeit Detective" and the other Sam-related crime novels!
